text: HuT-78 cells expressing <extra_id_0> GATA-3-GFP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were maintained at 37degreesC in growth medium in a closed FCS2 perfusion chamber ( Bioptechs , Butler , Pennsylvania , USA ) combined with an objective heater ( Bioptechs ) on the stage a Zeiss Axiovert 200 microscope ( Thornwood , New York , USA ) .

Observations were made by 40x1.0 NA oil-immersion objective lens , and fluorescence and phase contrast images were gathered using a Hamamatsu ORCA-ER charged coupled device camera ( Bridgewater , New Jersey , USA ) driven by Openlab software ( Improvision , Coventry , UK ) .
Photographs were taken at 0 , 30 , 60 , 120 , and 240 min .
